value:
Wherever I go, it's the same story...
A big, messy war that will bleed my
enemies dry. Bwa ha ha!

There isn't a drop of royal blood in
my veins. I got here with a hunger for
power, not some musty birthright.

Look at these chumps with their
guard down. If I wanted, I could have
all their heads in a pile.

You can summon as much cannon
fodder as you want? Perfect. I got a
job in Plegia with your name on it!

You know what I do to fools who
are all bark and no bite? I shut 'em
up with a boot in the mouth!

You really should work on your
security. If I were raiding this dump,
it'd already be a heap of ashes.$k$pBe careful who you trust, eh?
That's a little warning courtesy of
$Nf.

Gwa ha ha! I love putting runts right
where they belong—in the dirt!

What, you got something to say?
I'm just getting started, you'll see!

That's it?! Pathetic! Heads will
roll for this!

If I see something I want, I take it,
simple as that. Gwee hee hee!

It was you who summoned me, huh?
I'm Gangrel, King of Plegia, and you'd
best stay out of my way!

Normally, I don't have much to say to
you, other than pointing out all the
dumb decisions you make.$k$pBut there's something I must get off
my chest before your foolishness
gets you cut down.$k$pYou see, love, justice, destiny, all of
that lofty trash—it's worthless if
there's no bloodshed to back it up!$k$pDon't let worthless emotions get in
the way of cold, hard reality. These
Heroes? They're pawns, not people.$k$pYou got power, so use it. ALL of it.
Get your hands dirty, or you might
regret that you didn't.
ほっ
おらぁっ
ちっ
ぐあっ…！
Beg for your life!
Oh, shut up!
Just drop dead already!
You're an eyesore!
*groan* Really...
Gwee hee hee!
I'm Gangrel, King of Plegia. You the summoner? *laugh* Thought you'd be taller.
You got a death wish or something?
If you're gonna ask me to fight, it'd better be a massacre worthy of my time!
There is a truth about the world we must all learn. A man is either strong...or he is dead! Bwa ha haaa!
Truly, the heavens smile upon mighty King Gangrel this day! Bwa ha ha ha!
Every man lives and dies alone.
When it's kill or be killed...life or death...that's when you know who you really are.
Fine...
What?!
Out with it!
